sen.j: 社戸大口（こそへのおおくち、生没年不明）は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: KOSOHE no Okuchi (year of birth and death unknown) was one historical figure in the Asuka period.
KOSOHE no Okuchi (year of birth and death unknown) was a historical figure who lived during Japan's Asuka period.
sen.cmt: 他ファイルのネイティブチェックを参考に修正しました。
sen.e: KOSOHE no Okuchi (year of birth and death unknown) was a historical figure who lived during Japan's Asuka period.

sen.j: 旧仮名遣いでの読みは「こそへのおほくち」。
sen.e: In the old Japanese syllabary way of reading, it was read as 'KOSOHE no Ohokuchi'.
In the old Japanese kana syllabary, his name was read as 'KOSOHE no Ohokuchi'.
sen.cmt: 他ファイルのネイティブチェックを参考に修正しました。
sen.e: In the old Japanese kana syllabary, his name was read as 'KOSOHE no Ohokuchi'.

sen.j: 天武天皇元年（672年）の壬申の乱で大友皇子（弘文天皇）側につき、7月13日に近江国の安河の浜で敗れて捕らえられた。
sen.e: Although having taken sides with Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) at the Jinshin War in 672, KOSOHE was defeated in battle and fell into enemy hands.
In the Jinshin War in 672, KOSOHE was on the side of Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) and defeated in the battle on the beach of Yasugawa River in Omi Province on August 14 and fell into enemy hands.
sen.cmt: 日付と場所が抜けていたので追加しました。
sen.e: In the Jinshin War in 672, KOSOHE was on the side of Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun) and defeated in the battle on the beach of Yasugawa River in Omi Province on August 14 and fell into enemy hands.

sen.j: 社戸氏（許曽部氏）は、阿倍氏の同族にあたるが、大口については他に知られず、捕らえられてからどうなったかも不明である。
sen.e: The KOSOHE clan and The ABE clan were of the same family, but further information about him and even after his capture is still not clear.
The KOSOHE clan and the ABE clan were of the same family, but there is no further information about Okuchi and what had happened to him after his capture is unknown.
sen.cmt: 後半を書き換えました。
sen.e: The KOSOHE clan and the ABE clan were of the same family, but there is no further information about Okuchi and what had happened to him after his capture is unknown.
